mapper.select: SELECT ROOM_NO, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_PHOTO, ROOM_TYPE, ROOM_DEPOSIT, ROOM_PRICE, ROOM_EXTENT, ROOM_ADDR, ROOM_KIND, ROOM_STRUCTURE, ROOM_FLOOR, ROOM_REGDATE, ROOM_CPDATE, ROOM_AVDATE, ROOM_DETAIL, ROOM_ID FROM ROOM WHERE ROOM_NO = #{room_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE ROOM SET ROOM_NAME = #{room_name}, ROOM_PHOTO = #{room_photo}, ROOM_TYPE = #{room_type}, ROOM_DEPOSIT = #{room_deposit}, ROOM_PRICE = #{room_price}, ROOM_EXTENT = #{room_extent}, ROOM_ADDR = #{room_addr}, ROOM_KIND = #{room_kind}, ROOM_STRUCTURE = #{room_structure}, ROOM_FLOOR = #{room_floor}, ROOM_CPDATE = TO_DATE(#{room_cpdate}, 'yyyy/MM/dd'), ROOM_AVDATE = TO_DATE(#{room_avdate}, 'yyyy/MM/dd'), ROOM_DETAIL = #{room_detail} WHERE ROOM_NO = #{room_no}
